content: --तामिस्रः --श्रः (स्रं also). {1} complete or deep darkness (especially of the soul); तमिस्रोष्टदशधा तथा भवत्यंधतामिस्रः <ls>Sāṅ. K. 48</ls> ( भयविशेषविषयकोऽभिनिवेशः); तस्यामंधतामिस्रमभ्यध्यायत् <ls>Mv. 1.</ls> {2} spiritual ignorance (देहे नष्टे अहमेव नष्टःइतिरूपमज्ञानं); enveloped in utter darkness. (--स्रः, स्रं <ab>N.</ab> of a division of Tartarus or infernal regions, the second of the 21 hells to which those who seduce the wives of others and enjoy them are condemned. According to Bhavabhūti persons committing suicide were condemned to this hell; <ab>cf.</ab> अंधतामिस्रा ह्यसूर्या नाम ते लोकास्तेभ्यः प्रतिविधीयंते य आत्मघातिन इत्येवमृषयो मन्यंते <ls>U. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 88</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">197</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 224</ls>; doctrine of annihilation after death.
